name: PA179 - exam
note: Záverečná zkouška z PA179 ‑ ověřené správné odpovědi (opravená zkouška)

questions.question: Choose true statements about Project
correct: Project delivers a unique product or service
wrong: Project is best visualized with BPD

questions.question: Which of the following characteristics discourage from using PRINCE2 standard?
correct: Research type of project, unclear scope
wrong: Hierarchic organizational structure, large teams in different locations

questions.question: Which of the following combinations is suitable for large projects (one year or more)?
Which consequences may result from adding an item to Product Backlog (in a project according to Scrum)?
correct: Other item may not be developed

Leadership, Relations and Engagement, Results Orientation

questions.question: What can be read from Burndown chart?
correct: Remaining work until end of sprint
Team is falling behind a plan
